alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 04 at 2:56PM EDT until August 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Otsego County in central New York... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Edmeston, or 16 miles southeast of Hamilton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Edmeston around 300 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
